title: Revenue per employee of leading tech companies 2018
yAxis: Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars for 8 number of Companys.
The Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Company Netflix and lowest at Company Amazon.
The difference of Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Company is 1864884.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Company Netflix and lowest at Company Amazon.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars for 8 number of Companys.
The Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Company Netflix and lowest at Company Amazon.
The difference of Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Company is 1864884.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars in each Company on the y axis.
Company Netflix has the highest Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars and Amazon has the lowest Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars.
The maximum Company Netflix has got 6.18 times higher Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars than the minimum Company Amazon.
Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars at Company Netflix is 2224555.0 , second place is  at 2224555.0, and thirdly is Facebook at 1569056.0.
The average Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars in all 8 Companys is 1218917.25.
